CustomField.description: This is the e-mail address that the NI Emailer class sends an e-mail to when the "Create IT Work Ticket" Topic is assigned to a Chatter Post. Currently the e-mail address is "ithelpdesk@newmarketinc.com" which creates a ticket in Track-It
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the e-mail address that the NI Emailer class sends an e-mail to when the "Create IT Work Ticket" Topic is assigned to a Chatter Post. Currently the e-mail address is "ithelpdesk@newmarketinc.com" which creates a ticket in Track-It
CustomField.label: Email Address
